summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ESP32 IoT Copilot Phase 2 features including Groq/OpenRouter integration, syntax highlighting, project export, and shopping list generator. Most features working correctly with minor UI interaction issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 status code instead of 400 when API key missing
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling works but wrong HTTP status code

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown overlay prevents clicking on provider options

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console

passed_tests: Shopping list API generates correct data with Amazon/AliExpress links
Project export endpoints (Markdown and JSON) working
Hardware library API returns complete data
LLM generation with OpenAI provider working
Shopping list dialog opens and displays hardware categories
Component selection and shopping list generation works
Amazon and AliExpress links displayed correctly
Markdown and JSON export downloads work
Settings page displays provider comparison section
All three providers (OpenAI, Groq, OpenRouter) visible in UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix provider dropdown overlay issue in Settings page to allow proper selection of Groq/OpenRouter providers. Also fix HTTP status code for missing API keys (should be 400, not 520).
